description: Apartments In Birmingham AL Welcome to 100 Inverness Apartment Homes, a luxury apartment community tucked away into one of the most coveted locations in the city for Birmingham apartments. Find stylish one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment floor plans tailored to your wants and needs, complete with the amenities that are important to you. Our layouts come with just enough variety to enable you to make it your own haven unlike any other. Get inspired by our photos and the serenity of the nature surrounding you to let your aesthetic come together with our stylish, modern designs for a home you wonât be able to wait to show off to your guests. Even beyond style, our pet-friendly apartment community is also all about functionality! Some of our homes come with washer and dryer hookups, wood burning fireplaces, hardwood floors, and a private patio or balcony. All of our residents can make use of oversized walk-in closets, air conditioning, garages, a business center, on-site management and maintenance, a laundry facility, and more. Play a game or two of tennis at our tennis courts, take a dip in the pool at one of our pools, or try out the new grilling and picnic area! Make apartment life easier and take advantage of our online payment options, short term lease options, and valet trash services. Use our package receiving services for those out-of-town (or simply busy) days and know that we are here to support you and make your time in our pet-friendly apartment community a breeze. With charming homes and an alluring location near transportation options and shopping, dining, and entertainment hotspots, 100 Inverness Apartment Homes is an ideal place for anyone looking for the very best in a community that values each resident. Contact us or stop by to schedule a tour so you can learn more about our apartment community. We look forward to meeting you!  -Night Patrol -110 Acre Stocked Lake -2 Sparkling Swimming Pools -Washer/ Dryer Hookup (Select Units) -Cable Ready -Range -Individual Climate Control -Wood Burning Fireplaces In Select Units  Call:  show contact info   PET FRIENDLY, SPORTS BARS CLOSE BY FOR THE SPORT FANATICS, HOMEDEPOT, GRANDVIEW HOSPITAL, MODERN LAUNDRY FACILITIES, GOLDS GYM, SHOPPING AND DINING LESS THAN 5 MINUTES AWAY, PLANET FITNESS LESS THAN 5 MINUTES AWAY, JEFF STATE COLLEGE LESS THAN 10 MINUTES AWAY, OAK MOUNTAIN SCHOOL DISTRICT THAT INCLUDE (INVERNESS ELEMENTARY AND MIDDLE), BARK PARK, SPAIN PARK, 110 ACRE STOCKED FISHING LAKE, LAKE AND WOODED VIEWS, URGENT CARES NEARBY

Property Description Scenic inspiration surrounds The Avenues of Lakeshore (fka Wildwood Crossings) with graceful woods and a tranquil creek complimenting this vibrant apartment home community. Avenues of Inverness offers newly renovated 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartment homes. These beautiful homes feature interiors with amenities and finishes similar to a private home, yet offering the convenience and low-maintenance living of a luxury apartment community. Spacious, open-concept designs ensure you will fully enjoy life in your new apartment. With an extensive list of amenities, you will find everything you need for a comfortable lifestyle. Whether you spend your weekends lounging by the pool, enjoying a workout in the newly enhanced fitness center or relaxing by your fireplace, you will find that Avenues of Lakeshore has everything you need to enjoy the Birmingham lifestyle Details Availability date: Today Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb) Pet notes:  Deposit: $200 to 1 month rent Leasing options:  Leasing notes: None Application fee: $50 per person over 18 Amenities Included in Utilities Cost:  Utilities Cost:  Laundry: In Unit, W/d connections Parking type: Off-Street  Parking notes:  Appliances: Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven Exterior: Balcony/patio Heating/cooling: Central AC, Ceiling fans Wiring: Cable-ready, High-speed internet Facilities and Recreation: Shared pool, Fitness center, Clubhouse, Playground, Barbecue, Business center, Tennis court, Bark park, Volley ball Security and Access: Controlled access, Gated entry Views:  Additional features: Hardwood floor, Tile floor, Fireplace, Vaulted ceiling Offered by: Avenues of Lakeshore  Equal Housing Opportunity

Beautiful, conveniently located two bedroom condo at Hanover Circle Condominium in Highland Park. This condo has a beautifully renovated kitchen with new cabinets, premium counter top, and stainless steel appliances.  This unit has a properly vented dryer and washer in the unit.  The bathroom has been renovated with a subway tile shower/bathtub surround, new flooring, and a new vanity.  Hanover Circle is located in beautiful, historic Highland Park on Hanover Circle. Highland Park has been designated a "Top 10 American Neighborhoods" by the American Planning Association. Highland Park has been singled out by the prestigious organization for its distinctive public spaces, mix of land uses and housing options, its picturesque setting and strategic location, all of which have attracted families and individuals for generations.   Hanover is a gated community with the feel and look of the old Coastal South. With charming wrought iron, Bevolo gas lanterns, hurricane shutters and plantation doors, you will be reminded of Pensacola's Seville Quarter, Mobile's Spring Hill district or New Orleans' French Quarter, especially as you are greeted as you come and go by the grand Provincial fountain. The grounds are appointed with over 6 varieties of palms complimenting the "Old Quarter" feel.   Hanover's common areas are without comparison! Swim in Hanover's newly renovated saltwater pool. Pool deck has been totally renovated and decorated with exquisite naturally quarried travertine tile in classic herringbone pattern. Enjoy free access to Hanover's ample workout room as well. The property has spacious onsite parking inside the gated area. Many properties in the area have no private parking but at Hanover there is no need to fight for parking on the street!! The complex has a new digital security camera system. Additionally, the street on which the property is located (Hanover Circle) is within St. Vincent Hospital's security perimeter and is patrolled by St. Vincent security. Water, garbage, recycling and pest control are included. Cats allowed with a fee. Hanover Circle Condominium is a smoke-free property!  Pet friendly, but the condo association restricts dog breeds and weight to 25 pounds or less.  I want it to open back up in the summer, so the first lease could be around six months and then on 12 month terms.

Our Homewood Townhomes offer what no other property can: the largest space at an unbeatable price in a location convenient to the most popular destinations in Birmingham. Storage rooms set off the kitchen, full-sized attics, and walk-in closets are featured in every townhome. Over the mountain from Highlands, Five Points and downtown Birmingham and around the corner from SoHo Square, Hwy 31, and I-65, our townhomes are perfectly positioned to provide a quick commute in any direction.   This two bedroom, one bath unit rents for $840 a month with an $80 flat rate utility fee which covers water, sewer, and valet trash service.  This corner unit offers windows on three sides, only one shared wall with a neighbor, a private side entrance and yard space, and access to side street parking. It features hardwood floors throughout, a dishwasher, W/D connections in the kitchen, and central heat and air. With multiple closets, storage space outside the back door and a full-sized attic, this townhouse offers very spacious living. The Peony master bedroom has ample space for a king size bed, features walk-in closet, the first two bedrooms are perfect size for a queen or king bed or an office or play room. The cozy patio, perfect for relaxing or entertaining guest can be accessed from the living room, guest and first bedroom. Senior Housing 62+ Low Income 1 Bedroom Free Utilities Section 8 HUD a We are accepting applications for our low-income, HUD subsidized community located in south central Tennessee. The head of household must be at least 62 years old or older.  $295 a month is the average rent (UTILITIES INCLUDED) but your rent maybe higher or lower. The rent is based on 30% of your household's gross anticipated income.  The yearly income limits is $18,400 for one person or $21,000 for a couple. Deductions of medical expenses will decrease the monthly rent.  A security deposit is required at move in.   This quiet, beautiful apartment complex was built in 2004.  All 20 units (530 sq ft each) in 7 buildings are handicap accessible and have one bedroom, one bathroom, kitchen, dining room and living room are together. These ground level apartments have shower grab bars and bathtub fold down seats. There are no steps.  Leases include free utilities: electric, water, A/C, heating and sewer. Telephone, internet and cable are the responsibility of the Tenant.  The laundry room (washers/dryers) are FREE to use and a spacious community room available for your leisure.  Waynesboro was established in 1821 and serves as the county seat for Wayne County, Tennessee. The city is located at the junction of State Route 13 and U.S. Route 64.  It has more to offer than what you would expect from a small town... A City Park, Natchez Trace Trails, Golf Course, City Sportsplex, Canoe Rentals, Festivals, Museum, Historical Society, County Library, Restaurants, Shopping, Grocery Stores, Lodging, Courthouse, School System and the Hospital is located 1.1 mile from our property.  Grandview Senior Housing Inc. is a non-profit organization.  This property was developed for the purpose of providing decent, safe and sanitary, affordable housing. In exchange for rental payments, each resident is entitled to the exclusive use and enjoyment of his/her apartment in a peaceful, quiet, and private environment.   Grandview Senior Housing 216 Grandview Drive Waynesboro, TN 38485  show contact info  Office  --PLEASE CALL US FOR MORE INFORMATION OR TO SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT--

When you choose to live at Mountain View you will enjoy all of the conveniences and benefits of living in a peaceful small community while conveniently near the Oxford Exchange Shopping Center, Quintard Mall, Fort McClellan, Anniston Army Depot, Honda and the Gadsden State Ayer's Campus.  Whether your destination is work, school, or an outdoor recreational destination, you will have easy and convenient access to anywhere you want to go as a part of our community. When it comes to getting out and about, Mountain View Apartments are ideally situated. Our location near I-20 puts you within reach of all the recreational activities and community events that contribute to the high quality of life enjoyed by Oxford, AL residents. Local attractions include Cheaha State Park, Oxford Performing Arts Center, Oxford Civic Center and Oxford Lake. We are also less than 30 minutes from the Honda Plant, PLUS there are plenty of nearby restaurants including national chains like Panera Bread, Golden Corral and Olive Garden, and local favorites like Cheaha Brewery, Garfericks Cafe, Peerless Bar & Saloon and the Classic on Noble.Our friendly, on-site management team invites you to call or stop by and see us today! With quick access to I-565, you are just minutes from a variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment. Madison is also home to some of the top elementary, middle, and high schools in the area.  Madison Landing offers spacious apartment homes with seven different floor plans. Our apartment homes have one, two, and three-bedroom options. Some of the attractive features included are vaulted ceilings, all-electric kitchens, a balcony or patio for your enjoyment, walk-in closets, and a wood-burning fireplace. Come and see why Madison Landing at Research Park Apartments is one of the best-kept secrets in Madison, Alabama.
